changes.description: Add styles for per-message copy-to-clipboard button and make message bubble a positioned container

patches.anchor: .msg { max-width: 90%; padding: 10px 12px; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 10px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; }

changes.description: Add attachCopyButton utility and enhance addMsg to set dataset and auto-attach copy button

patches.match: import { getEl, setBusy, addMsg, detectBasePath } from './ui.js';
patches.replacement: import { getEl, setBusy, addMsg, detectBasePath, attachCopyButton } from './ui.js';

changes.description: Attach copy buttons to restored conversation history messages
Ensure RAG-only assistant answer gets a copy button with clean text

patches.replacement:
ragMsg.dataset.msg = ragResponse?.answer || '';
        try { attachCopyButton(ragMsg, () => ragMsg.dataset.msg || ragMsg.textContent || ''); } catch {}

changes.description: After summarize streaming completes, attach copy button to the assistant message
